name: Sokoban (Ursanon)
description:
Sokoban

Our first finished game (from 2015).

It's remake of classic Sokoban game. You can move more than one box at the same time. 

At this moment we have 20 interesting, but not so complex levels.

Controls:
WSAD /arrows    - moving
V                                   - change camera
+/-                                - scroll in/out
F1                                - map restart

// !Cheat!
F2                                - next map

Authors:

Code: Krzysztof Begiedza

UI/art: Joanna Lubańska

Special thanks to Kenney.
